p: SA and AG conceptualized and designed the study protocol; SA and FTR prepared the plant extract, designed protocols, collected and calculated the data. NUE and SAS designed, conducted the computational analysis; NUE, SA, SS, MNI and SAS - wrote the manuscript. AG and MRH supervised, monitored the research. SA, AG, MRH, MNI, SAS and NUE along with writing, reviewed and edited manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript for publication.
